name: RGB Squad
description:
Destroy evil robots in 3 player co-op

RGB Squad is a co-op action game, design for three players. Every player control different character with unique abbilities. Players can fight together for winning, and fight with each other for scores. To join game second and third player need to press any of their keys.

Would like to comment ? - https://www.facebook.com/RGB-Squad-1614956065418498

Do you like it? Maybe you would donate this ;)

RULES

For now, the main objective is to destroy 25*(players number) robots. Players fails when too many evil robots reach bottom gates. Key to winning is finding better power-ups in specific color, dedicated for each heroin.

CONTROLS

You can try on keyboard, I prefer gamepad ;)

  • Player 1 RED on keyboard
    • W - jump / double jump
    • A - go left
    • D - go right
    • Q - shoot left
    • E - shoot right
  • Player 2 GREEN on keyboard
    • I - jump
    • J - go left
    • L - go right
    • U - shoot left
    • O - shoot right
  • Player 3 BLUE on keyboard (numpad)
    • 2 - jump
    • 4 - go left
    • 6 - go right
    • 1 - shoot left
    • 3 - shoot right
  • All Players on keyboard:
    • P - pause game
    • Escape/F1 - restart game
    • F11 - full screen
Gamepad:
  • A - jump
  • Left Stick or D-pad - go left and right
  • X or Left Trigger - shoot left
  • B or Right Trigger - shoot right
